item.title: Finished Repairing the Broken D11 Ripper Shank
item.description: The D11 ripper shank repair is complete. Drilling, machining, and careful finishing restore this massive component to full working order.

media:content.media:title: Finished Repairing the Broken D11 Ripper Shank
media:content.media:description: The D11 ripper shank repair is complete. Drilling, machining, and careful finishing restore this massive component to full working order.

item.title: Caterpillar 140M Grader Hydraulic Cylinder Repair
item.description: The hydraulic cylinders on a 140M grader are due for a rebuild. Follow the teardown, machining, and repair steps that return them to reliable service.

media:content.media:title: Caterpillar 140M Grader Hydraulic Cylinder Repair
media:content.media:description: The hydraulic cylinders on a 140M grader are due for a rebuild. Follow the teardown, machining, and repair steps that return them to reliable service.

item.title: Repairing D11 Dozer Cylinders with the Milling Machine
item.description: These D11 dozer cylinders need serious attention. Watch how careful milling restores critical surfaces and brings these massive components back into working condition.

media:content.media:title: Repairing D11 Dozer Cylinders with the Milling Machine
media:content.media:description: These D11 dozer cylinders need serious attention. Watch how careful milling restores critical surfaces and brings these massive components back into working condition.

item.title: Gouging and Welding Repairs on a D8 Dozer Push Arm
item.description: Heavy wear calls for heavy repair. Gouging, welding, and reshaping bring this D8 push arm back to strength and ready for more work in the dirt.

media:content.media:title: Gouging and Welding Repairs on a D8 Dozer Push Arm
media:content.media:description: Heavy wear calls for heavy repair. Gouging, welding, and reshaping bring this D8 push arm back to strength and ready for more work in the dirt.

item.title: Machining a Massive Custom Nut from Solid 4140 Steel
item.description: A seized EX1200 cylinder nut had to be gouged off — now a brand‑new one is machined from solid 4140 steel. See the precision work that turns raw material into a heavy‑duty custom component.

media:content.media:title: Machining a Massive Custom Nut from Solid 4140 Steel
media:content.media:description: A seized EX1200 cylinder nut had to be gouged off — now a brand‑new one is machined from solid 4140 steel. See the precision work that turns raw material into a heavy‑duty custom component.

item.title: Can This Broken Transmission Housing Be Saved?
item.description: A damaged transmission housing comes into the shop, and the big question is whether it can be repaired. Watch the inspection, machining, and problem‑solving that determine its fate.

media:content.media:title: Can This Broken Transmission Housing Be Saved?
media:content.media:description: A damaged transmission housing comes into the shop, and the big question is whether it can be repaired. Watch the inspection, machining, and problem‑solving that determine its fate.

item.title: Rear Strut Rod Back to Like‑New Condition
item.description: A bit of focused work is all it takes to bring this rear strut rod back to life. Watch the repair process that restores strength, alignment, and reliability.

media:content.media:title: Rear Strut Rod Back to Like‑New Condition
media:content.media:description: A bit of focused work is all it takes to bring this rear strut rod back to life. Watch the repair process that restores strength, alignment, and reliability.

item.title: Cast Iron Weld Repair on a Vintage Huron
item.description: This vintage Huron machine needs cast iron weld repair. Watch the careful process that brings old iron back to working condition.

media:content.media:title: Cast Iron Weld Repair on a Vintage Huron
media:content.media:description: This vintage Huron machine needs cast iron weld repair. Watch the careful process that brings old iron back to working condition.

item.title: Unboxing and Testing the i450 Arc Spray
item.description: The i450 Arc Spray gets unboxed and put to the test. See how it performs in real workshop conditions.
